name: Volcano Rush (DawnWorks)
description:
A 2D Platformer where you have to contend with falling debris and rising lava to escape the volcano.

This is the first game I have made and although it is a little rough around the edges, I'm really proud of it. Leave a comment telling me  what bits you enjoyed and didn't enjoy so I can improve for next time.

Please share and follow and get ready for plenty more games.
